# index(forSectionIdentifier:)

**Instance Method**

Returns an index for the section with the identifier you specify in the collection view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func index(forSectionIdentifier identifier: Any) -> Int
```

## Identifying sections

- **sectionIdentifier(for:)**: Returns an identifier for the section at the index you specify in the collection view.

items.description: Returns an identifier for the section at the index you specify in the collection view.
items.name: sectionIdentifier(for:)
